did.unittitle: Harper's New Monthly Magazine, assorted literature

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This folder comprises a copy of Harper's New Monthly Magazine published in June 1882, a badly damaged page torn from the book Consuelo by George Sand (1842), torn pages about martial law, a copy of a quarterly magazine titled Vick's Floral Guide published in 1876, and the last pages torn from the book An Old Man of Twenty-Five (1848).
